name: ASCO MEDICAL
overview:
Established in year 1948, we, “ASCO MEDICAL LTD”, are counted among the distinguished organization engaged in manufacturing distributing, wholesaling and exporting Orthopedic Instruments, Implants & Fixators.

Our Products: Firm-Lock Plate 4.5/5.0, Narrow Firm-Lock Plate 4.5/5.0 Broad Firm-Lock Small Plate 3.5 mm Firm-Lock Metaphyseal Plate Firm-Lock Cloverleaf Plates 3.5 Firm-Lock Small T-Plates Firm-Lock T Plate Firm-Lock T-Buttress Plate Firm-Lock L-Buttress Plate 4.5/5.0

Worldwide Patronage: There is practically no country of the world where the ‘ASCO’ products have not found way at one time or the other, either direct or through re-exports by our customers. At present, ‘ASCO’ products are being exported to over forty countries.

Meeting Individual Requirements: Every order, howsoever big or small, is complied with in accordance with individual requirements.

Twin Passion: Commitment to quality as well as holding the price line is the twin passion with ‘ASCO’.

Assets: Ever growing clientele and excellent references - both bank & trade - are our assets we feel justly proud of.
